alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 16 at 9:00PM CST until February 17 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow continuing through the late evening. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lake IL County. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered, hazardous roads. Patchy blowing snow will further reduce low visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
